name: Cliff Hanger (itch) (Litiacus)
description:
In Cliff Hanger, you need to give the customers the equipment they need to go bungee jumping. Be careful! Your boss is expecting much of you! Don't get fired!

CONTROLS
Movement - WASD
Interact - E

Not sure why but the coloring seems weird on the itch page, the game was quite a bit darker while testing it. No idea why.

Game Made for VimJam 2 
-- September 10th 2021 - September 20th 2021 --
